Method Detail

getFileTemplate

public static java.lang.String getFileTemplate(IFile file,
                                               java.lang.String templateFile)
Initializes file contents with a template. The contents of the template are loaded, and then the following fields are filled in:

${file} - The name of the file, including extension

${name} - The name of the file, minus the extension.

${filePath} - The full path of the file.

${template} - The name of the template that is being loaded from.

${parentDir} - The name of the directory the file is in.

${date} - The current date and time.

${project} - The project this file belongs to.

Parameters:
file - The file to be initialized.
templateFile - The name of the template file.
Returns:
A Stream containing the contents to be placed in the file.
